citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on August
27, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking to a family member who stated no one was
available for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on August 
27, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by speaking to a family member who stated no one was 
available for an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
